channel.title: BitBoard
channel.description: BitBoard is a website where a group of people can share ideas and opinions in a productive manner.

item.title: Updated Contact List
item.description: We have updated the contact credentials on our website. Take a look at it if you want to drop us any suggestions or emails !

item.title: A New Beginning
item.description: We are proud to annoucne the influx of 1000 new users since the launch. We really appreciate your following and we are very proud of it.

item.title: Tutorial
item.description: We are proud to announce that we have made a simple tutorial in order for the layman to understand our website

item.title: Welcome to BitBoard
item.description: We are proud to announce the launch of our website. BitBoard is a website where a group of people can share ideas and opinions in a productive manner. We welcome you here.
